The Shenmue 3 surveys are now starting to go out via email from Fangamer. Do not worry if you have not received any communication yet, they will be sending out surveys gradually, so make sure to keep checking BOTH your INBOX and SPAM folders.

To prepare you for what you will need, here is a list below, to have a think, and to make sure you get your survey returned promptly & accurately.

***INFORMATION YOU WILL NEED***

-Name
-Shipping Address
- Version of the game you want (Physical Steam Disc - Kickstarter Exclusive Case, Plysical Playstation 4 Disc - Kickstarter Exclusive Case, Steam Digital Download, Playstation Digital Download)
- Name to appear on Shenmue 3 Homepage
- Name to appear in the game credits
- T-Shirt Size
- Your name for the Choubu Inn Guestbook
- Your 140 character message for the Choubu Inn Guestbook
- Your name for the Special Sponsor section (if applicable)
- Your picture for the Harbour Lounge Waiting Area. Height = 1280x768
- an upload of your autograph to accompany the photo

Shenmue I & II has now received a rating by the ESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board), a sign of progress for the preparation for its release, the date of which is pending announcement. Console manufacturers require games that are published on their systems in the U.S. and Canada to be rated by ESRB, hence it is a key step prior to release.

The rating that has been given is "Teen", which corresponds to ages 13 and up.

The Rating Summary is worth a read for its rather detailed description. Spot the "shout-out" to Joy!

SEGA has now officially confirmed a release date of August 21st, 2018, for Shenmue I & II on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Steam.

The collection of both original games in their newly enhanced forms is now available to pre-order digitally on PlayStation Network, Xbox Live, and Steam.

(Physical pre-orders for console versions have been available at many retailers since April, taking the Amazon charts by storm.)

Along with the release date and news of digital pre-orders going live, SEGA has published a new trailer which can be viewed on their YouTube channel:
